Detailed Description

This file contains the function declarations.

  • Compiler: IAR EWAVR and GNU GCC for AVR
  • Supported devices: AT90USB162, AT90USB82

Author:
Atmel Corporation: http://www.atmel.com
Support and FAQ: http://support.atmel.no/

U16 hal_nrf_read_rx_pload ( U8 *  buf  ) 

Reads the content of rx payload.

Parameters:
buf is a pointer to the location were you want to store the received data
Returns:
the function returns a byte composed of the receiving pipe(MSB) and the data length (LSB)

00063    U8 length;
00064    U8 pipe;
00065

addr is the address to write.

void NRF_open_pipe ( U8  pipe_num,
U8  auto_ack 
)

Open pipe (pipe_num: 0~5, auto_ack: 0/1).

Parameters:
pipe_num contains the number of the pipe to open
auto_ack : put 1 if you want Auto-Acknoledgment, 0 otherwise
